title.rendered: Approved Asos.com gift card carding method 2023

content.rendered:
ASOS is a British online fashion and cosmetic retailer. You can buy any type of clothing for men or female in this site. We will card gift cards and then sell them or use them to buy from site.
If you need an item from the site, this method may be your best shot if you don’t want to spend hundreds of dollars there. Just get the items below



Requirements:

  • Method – the most valuable item in carding. Gladly you have this to work with
  • You should understand the basics of carding
  • High Bal NonVbv CC with Fullz – Buy a CC from wcc
  • Proxy/Vpn/Rdp – For changing our virtual location while carding
  • Phone number, you can use the wcc phone manager to get a number to register (optional)

Site: asos.com

We will card for gift cards which will be delivered via email. This is very convenient and will ease a lot of the process

Steps:

  1. Buy Fullz From WCC

Go to wcc-plug.su and create a new account, fill your email and create password.
Use this link to avoid scam sites: https://wcc-plug.su Many sites try to clone and host this site so make sure you click on the link above or type direct on address bar. Account creation is free again but make sure you top up your account in a day to avoid suspension.
Go to your preferred country of choice and select Gold Cards. They work best. In my case I will work with US. Make sure you choose a card with full info and nonvbv like the one below



All cards are live and A balance checker is available so make sure you use it. Will help in making orders and make sure your card can hold the order amount.

Choose a full info card

  • Address
  • Nonvbv
  • Fullz
  • Names
  • Cvv
  1. Visit asos.com site

Here is the official page for Asos.com, make sure you visit the correct link
Not all websites will work with this method. In my case I used an ad link to visit the site

Use your Firefox browser + proxy/vpn to visit the site find the user registration form
We will first fill all the required info then card

  1. Create account


Fill all the required info in the page. A lot of info for the register page, make sure you use the fullz info in the card you bought from wcc

For email, you should create one with names of the cc holder and use it, create a good password.

For address, fill the cc holders address.

  1. Go to Buy gift cards

Since we will be carding for gift cards, there is no need to shop physical items and instead head to gift card section and select it

  1. Gift vouchers

Gift Cards vouchers are delivered by email, make sure you select same day delivery and to be sent the code and wait for about 3 mins to receive in your email

  1. Select the Gift Card Amount

Pick the highest amount your card can hold and proceed to checkout

You can enter amount manually in the field, make sure you stay under card balance. You should have checked on wcc for card balance when you buy.

  1. Gift message

Go to gifting and select to add a message. It is always good to leave a message for the gift card.
Don’t leave the card blank and instead make sure you modify and add a good message that will be sent to the recipient email

  1. Checkout

Select the checkout button and proceed to add your card info

  1. Add billing and payment method

Add Your fullz info in the billing and attach a credit card you got with the fullz

Type your credit card info into the box and complete payment

  1. Order confirmation

Next place your order and wait for confirmation. You will receive and email confirming and a summary of your order in the site. The gift code will be sent to the email in less than 3 mins
